title: Song about a legend

embed.title: Legends - I Broke Johnny's Legs (Official Lyric Video)
embed.description: This is our Lyric Video for our Song "Legends" from our Album "Colorful". It's about a girl named Katarina who is ruining herself by not being careful. We tell her story like her life was an epic battle. Katarina can only become a Legend if she acts like we tell her.

body:
Dear LoL-Community,

we are **"I Broke Johnny's Legs"** a Metalcore-Band from Germany, Nuremberg.
We recorded our first studio-album (Colorful), on which we recorded a track called "Legends" about a gril named "Katarina".
The lyrics express the way she has to take to become a **Legend**, so it would quite fit to the champion **Katarina** related in **League of Legends**.
We hope you like it and tell us what you think about it! 

Please tell us your opinion if you think this should be the titlesong for a new skin or a champoin rework for **Katarina**!

replies.body: I love it! And I love KATA!
